title: Patient Care Practical Competency Enhancement: Language Education Competency Development Through Online Peer Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners recognize social network influence during peer assessment and can enhance language education design capabilities by 20% using peer feedback
Learners acquire skills in expressing positive emotions and writing high-quality comments in online collaborative environments, improving evaluation participation rates by 30%
Based on peer assessment feedback, learners strengthen cognitive structuring abilities to derive three applicable strategies for actual language class design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
